secondBlock.title1: The foundation was founded on April 22, 2015 by a group of
secondBlock.text1: At the time of creation we had 2 directions with several successful projects, namely:
secondBlock.text2: 1.ECOLOGY ENVIRONMENT (Tree planting, Cleaning of the environment in the forest part)
secondBlock.text3: 2.HELP FOR CHILDREN (including provision of medicines to children diagnosed with cerebral palsy)
secondBlock.text4: Due to the too young age of the team and lack of experience, the work of the foundation had to be stopped.
secondBlock.text6: RUSSIA INVADED INTO THE TERRITORY OF OUR UKRAINE
secondBlock.text7: The team of our foundation has decided to defend our state, help the military and migrants
secondBlock.text9: : who can help our defenders and injured civilians.
